name: Starbase Gunship
description:
Your quick reflexes combined with your formidable arsenal is all that stands between thousands of civilian lives and an Alien invasion fleet. With your precision aiming, the Drone fleet’s evasive maneuvers don't stand a chance.

In Starbase Gunship you control the weapons systems of an advanced combat spacecraft orbiting a remote outpost.. The starbase is under attack from an AI controlled robotic species called the Drones, sending wave after wave of ships towards the starbase in order to destroy it as they expand across the galaxy.

“Terminate with extreme prejudice”

- Arm your Gunship with Lasers, Missiles, Railguns and a Vulcan Cannon.
- Upgrade your weapons to increase their firepower and range.
- Fortify the Starbase with improved hull plating.
- Strengthen the Starbase with improved hull plating.
- Use the Generator to increase the efficiency of your weapons
- Exterminate entire waves of enemy ships with nuclear warheads.
- Protect convoys evacuating the Starbase.
- Face off against fighters, automated torpedoes and massive capital ships.
